text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition ext-R5-DeviceAssociation

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*ExtensionA record of association or dissociation of a device with a patient
Slices for extension 2..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:device 1..1ExtensionReference to the devices associated with the patient or group
value[x] 0..1Reference(Device)Reference to the devices associated with the patient or group
extension:category 0..*ExtensionDescribes the relationship between the device and subject
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptDescribes the relationship between the device and subject
extension:status 1..1Extensionimplanted | explanted | attached | entered-in-error | unknown
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptimplanted | explanted | attached | entered-in-error | unknown
Binding: Cross-version VS for R5.DeviceAssociationCodes for use in FHIR R4 (required): Describes the lifecycle of the association.
extension:statusReason 0..*ExtensionThe reasons given for the current association status
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptThe reasons given for the current association status
Binding: Cross-version VS for R5.DeviceAssociationCodes for use in FHIR R4 (required): Describes the reason for changing the status of the association.
extension:bodyStructure 0..1ExtensionCurrent anatomical location of the device in/on subject
value[x] 0..1Reference(BodyStructure)Current anatomical location of the device in/on subject
extension:period 0..1ExtensionBegin and end dates and times for the device association
value[x] 0..1PeriodBegin and end dates and times for the device association
extension:operation 0..*ExtensionThe details about the device when it is in use to describe its operation
Slices for extension 1..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:status 1..1ExtensionDevice operational condition
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptDevice operational condition
Binding: deviceassociation-operationstatus (??) (example): Describes the the status of the association operation.
extension:operator 0..*ExtensionThe individual performing the action enabled by the device
value[x] 0..1Reference(Patient | Practitioner | RelatedPerson)The individual performing the action enabled by the device
extension:period 0..1ExtensionBegin and end dates and times for the device's operation
value[x] 0..1PeriodBegin and end dates and times for the device's operation
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-DeviceAssociation"

Documentation for this format

name: ext_R5_DeviceAssociation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DeviceAssociation for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceAssociation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceAssociation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.
